item.title: Researcher who has distorted voter data appointed to Homeland Security election integrity role
item.description: Heather Honey, a conservative election researcher, was appointed to the new role amid Trump's push to restructure how elections are run.

item.title: Feds fail to get indictment against DC 'Subway' sandwich thrower who DOJ fired
item.description: Sean Charles Dunn was fired from his job at the Department of Justice after the sub-chucking incident, which was caught on video.

item.title: Two children dead, 17 people injured in Annunciation school shooting: Minneapolis police
item.description: President Donald Trump spoke to Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz about the Annunciation school shooting, the White House said.

item.title: Trump White House pressures Fed Governor Lisa Cook to go on leave as lawsuit looms
item.description: The comments from Kevin Hassett, President Donald Trump's top economic advisor, come amid a brewing legal battle between Cook and the Trump administra...

item.title: Fed responds to Trump effort to fire Lisa Cook, notes president needs 'cause'
item.description: Federal Reserve Board Governor Lisa Cook hired Abbe Lowell to fight her termination by President Trump for a case that could land at the Supreme Court...
